training_phrases: how do I use your API
intents.short_response: You can find our API documentation at docs.example.com/api with code examples in Python, JavaScript, and Go.
intents.detailed_response:
Our API Documentation includes:

1. Getting Started:
   - Sign up for an API key
   - Authentication methods (OAuth2, API Key)
   - Rate limiting information

2. API Reference:
   - Complete endpoint documentation
   - Request/response examples
   - Error handling guide

3. Code Examples:
   - Python SDK
   - JavaScript/Node.js SDK
   - Go SDK
   - cURL examples

4. Webhooks:
   - Event types
   - Payload examples
   - Testing webhooks

Visit: https://docs.example.com/api

intents.short_response: Install our SDK using npm, pip, or go get depending on your language.
intents.detailed_response:
SDK Installation Guide:

Python:
  pip install example-sdk
  
JavaScript/Node.js:
  npm install example-sdk
  
Go:
  go get github.com/example/sdk

Ruby:
  gem install example-sdk

Java:
  Add to your Maven pom.xml or Gradle build.gradle

After installation, import and initialize:
  from example_sdk import Client
  client = Client(api_key='your_api_key')

View full setup guide at: https://docs.example.com/setup

intents.short_response: Check our troubleshooting guide or contact our support team for code-specific issues.
intents.detailed_response:
Common Issues and Solutions:

1. Authentication Errors:
   - Verify your API key is correct
   - Check token expiration
   - Ensure headers are set properly

2. Connection Issues:
   - Check your internet connection
   - Verify endpoint URLs
   - Check firewall/proxy settings

3. Rate Limiting:
   - Implement exponential backoff
   - Queue requests
   - Upgrade your plan for higher limits

4. JSON Parsing Errors:
   - Validate JSON formatting
   - Check character encoding
   - Use try-catch blocks

Debug Checklist:
   - Enable debug logging
   - Check server logs
   - Verify request/response payloads

For detailed help, visit: https://docs.example.com/troubleshooting
